snippet: Mr. Charney has ceded authority to the investment firm, Standard General, with which he teamed up to retake control of the company he founded.
abstract: Standard General, little-known hedge fund backing ousted American Apparel founder Dov Charney, emerges as critical power broker in battle for control of struggling retailer; Charney has ceded authority to investment firm, with which he teamed up to retake control of company.

byline.original: By ELIZABETH A. HARRIS and ALEXANDRA STEVENSON

lead_paragraph: Mr. Charney has ceded authority to the investment firm, Standard General, with which he teamed up to retake control of the company he founded.

headline.main: American Apparel Deal Gives Power to Hedge Fund, Not Dov Charney
headline.print_headline: American Apparel Deal Gives Power to Hedge Fund, Not Founder
